Terrorsaur:





Terrorsaur returned to the cave, save the devise. He gruggled in annoyance. 
He had a feeling Megatron was going to yell at him for it. He flapped his 
wings until he came to an unknown bot by the mouth of the cave.

"Terrorsaur, terrorize!" He transformed to his robot mode and drew his gun 
on Drillbit. "What are you doing here? Where did you come from?" he demanded 
in his gruff voice.
